member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraReports.Web.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderModel.HandlerUri

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraReports.Web.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderModel.RightToLeft

member.value: true, if the Query Builder has the right-to-left UI orientation; otherwise, false.
